name: 3rd Grade Theatre
description: Made as part of the 2019 Ubisoft Game Lab competition by a team of 8 people, this game casts you in the role of a third grade acting teacher who wants to make the best play in the world. The only issue: your actors are all kids and you've got no budget! It's up to you to craft costumes and decors, handle the misbehaving children and make sure everything runs smoothly. Good luck!
